data.title: Dugongidae Gray 1821
data.text:
Family DUGONGIDAE View in CoL

(DUGONG)

• Medium-sized sirenian with pectoral flippers lacking nails, no external hindlimbs, and a whale-like tail fluke with a median notch.

• 200-330 cm. View Figure

• Subtropical and tropical Indo-West Pacific waters. View Figure

Coastal and island waters with seagrass meadows

.

1 genus, 1 species, at least 1 extant taxon

.

1 species Vulnerable; 1 species Extinct since 1600 (1768).

No known copyright restrictions apply. See Agosti, D., Egloff, W., 2009. Taxonomic information exchange and copyright: the Plazi approach. BMC Research Notes 2009, 2:53 for further explanation.
